_readme: API credentials - each entry shows which scripts use it via _used_by field

google_search._comment: Google Custom Search API - 100 free queries/day
google_search._setup: Get key at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials, create CSE at https://programmablesearchengine.google.com/

context7._comment: Context7 - MCP server, no API key needed. Configure in mcp_settings.json instead.

gmail_oauth._comment: Gmail API uses OAuth2, not API keys. Credentials stored per-account in tools/email/{account}/
gmail_oauth._setup:
1. Create OAuth Desktop App at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials
2. Enable Gmail API at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/library/gmail.googleapis.com
3. Download client_secret*.json to tools/email/{account_name}/
4. Run 'python tools/email/auth.py {account_name}' to authorize
5. token.pickle will be created after OAuth flow

microsoft_graph._comment: Microsoft Graph API for Outlook/Office 365 email access
microsoft_graph._setup:
1. Register app at https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_AAD_RegisteredApps
2. Add API permission: Microsoft Graph > Mail.Read (Application)
3. Create client secret under Certificates & secrets
4. Grant admin consent for the permissions
